entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerland 10:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: SE 29 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Snow mixed with rain beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow early in the morning. Snow level rising to 700 metres in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
